definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
literary inquisition/official persecution of intellectuals for their writing

pinyin: Zhong1 Ri4 Han2 tong3 yi1 biao3 yi4 wen2 zi4

sentences.english: However, the equivalent English word "forest" takes six.
sentences.chinese: 而對應的英文字“forest”需要六個字節。

sentences.english: These nonsense letter, they are only the night-blooming cereus blossom from the fingertip.
sentences.chinese: 這些胡言亂語的文字，它們只是指尖開出的曇花。

sentences.english: His writings had been translated into various languages.
sentences.chinese: 他的著作已被譯成幾種文字。

sentences.english: Are you through with this word-processor?
sentences.chinese: 這臺文字處理機你用完了嗎？

sentences.english: According to the Chinese character semeiology, code-switching function is the basic information function of character system.
sentences.chinese: 代碼轉換功能是文字系統最基本的信息功能之一。

sentences.english: Are you still in WordPerfect, or did you get out?
sentences.chinese: 你在用文字完全軟件，還是退出了？

sentences.english: Mongolia and Russia, based on the use of Cyrillic alphabet text.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古和俄羅斯境內的使用斯拉夫字母爲基礎的文字。

sentences.english: Cannot change text flow because columns will overflow into margins .
sentences.chinese: 不能改變文字排列，因爲欄將溢出到頁邊距中。

sentences.english: The article is written in everyday language.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章以淺白文字寫成。

sentences.english: The following appeared in an article from a popular newsmagazine.
sentences.chinese: 下述文字摘自某通俗時事雜誌的一篇文章。

sentences.english: Appearance of the first written symbols.
sentences.chinese: 原始文字符號開始出現。

sentences.english: Copyfitting cannot be used on columns of text.
sentences.chinese: 組排文字功能無法用於分欄的文字。

sentences.english: Copyfitting cannot be used on columns of text.
sentences.chinese: 組排文字功能無法用於分欄的文字。

sentences.english: These characters seem to be another new decoration.
sentences.chinese: 這些杯盤裏的文字似乎也成了一種新穎的裝飾。

sentences.english: Any other text should be short and easy to digest.
sentences.chinese: 任何文字都應該簡短並容易消化。

sentences.english: And if you are English, you'd avidly defend your words.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是英國人，你會迫切地要捍衛你的文字。

definition: Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
